title: If I get ranked in preseason bad will that effect season 8?
body: Hey, I recently got level 30, and I'm wondering if preseason will effect my chances of a good rank in season 8. I wasn't ranked ever in season 7. I'm not doing so well in my placements and I don't want to complete them if it will get me in bronze for season 8. Will still loosing only a few effect my chances? Help!

replies.body: Ranking during preseason doesn't really apply towards your rank when the next season starts. This is meant to be a sort of downtime period for ranked play.
